p: Only five of the 64 SHUE cities in the European Region have reported annual average concentrations of PM 2.5 under the WHO guideline ( 25) of 10 μg.m -3 ( Fig. 4.A): Stockholm (5.51 μg.m -3), Oulu (7.65 μg.m -3), Helsinki (8.96 μg.m -3), Bressanone (9.23 μg.m -3) and Madrid (9.95 μg.m -3). The highest annual average PM 2.5 levels were in Konya (39.34 μg.m -3), Denizli (44.79 μg.m -3) and Ankara (46.93 μg.m -3), but with levels well below those of cities with the highest concentrations outside the European Region.
